title: The Borneo Campaign Part 3
itunes:title: The Borneo Campaign Part 3
itunes:subtitle: Balipapan
description:
With Tarakan and North Borneo secured, the last great Allied attack of World War II would take place with the landings to take Balikpapan. Despite the war being almost over, the capture of Balikpapan was deemed vital and so despite disquiet among some of the Australian High Command, the invasion went forward.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
